snippet.title: Zorbit's Orbits Official Trailer
snippet.description:
RELEASE DATE: April 28, 2017 for Windows.  OSX shortly thereafter.

Zorbit's Orbits is a 2D platformer with circular levels, inspired by games like Mario Galaxy and Sonic The Hedgehog.

Check us out on Twitter: @JeremieDuval and @CoreySelover
